This class contains test cases that helped show bugs in our program

Calendar - Class in model
This class represents the data structure that holds all the Calendar events.

This class executes the main method inside of the view.

CalendarView - Class in view
This class represents the view that lets the user interact with the calendar.
CalendarView() - Constructor for class view.CalendarView
 
containsDay(Integer, Integer, Integer) - Method in class controller.CalendarController
Identifies if event(s) have been planned for this specific day
containsMonth(Integer, Integer) - Method in class controller.CalendarController
Identifies if event(s) have been planned for this specific month.
containsYear(Integer) - Method in class controller.CalendarController
Identifies if event(s) have been planned for this specific year.
controller - package controller
 
createBottom() - Method in class view.CalendarView
Create the bottom of the GridPane, for the Scene
createEventBox() - Method in class view.CalendarView
Create a Dialog Box, utilized for adding an event to the Calendar.
createMonthBox(int, int) - Method in class view.CalendarView
The createMonthBox method does the exact same thing as the weekBox but in month format, however it is slightly longer due to necessary formatting
createTop() - Method in class view.CalendarView
Create the top of the GridPane, for the Scene
createWeekBox(int, int, int) - Method in class view.CalendarView
The createWeekBox method creates an Hbox that we can put directly in the center of the calander for when we need to switch between views
